events.name: Chief Data Officer Summit - Day 1
events.description: Chief Data Officer Summit 2017, a 2 day event hosted by The Innovation Enterprise Ltd. You must register with the event to book your seat. Description: "Manage Data and Lead the Change for Future Competitiveness" More information: https://theinnovationenterprise.com/summits/cdo-singapore-2017 Agenda: Tuesday, July 4 08:00 - Registration & Light Breakfast 08:50 - Chairperson Overview 09:00 - Enable Innovation with Data Strategy 09:30 - Positioning the Financial Sector for the Future Digital Economy 10:00 - Thriving on Data Governance 10:30 - Coffee Break 11:00 - Data-Driven Decision Making – A Formula 1 Perspective 11:30 - The Journey to GDPR Compliance 12:00 - Develop Data Strategy Across Regions 12:30 - Lunch 14:00 - Manage Big Data and Create Context for Better Engagement 14:30 - Data Science - A Journey to Adoption 15:00 - Coffee Break 15:30 - Data Science to Explore Business Potential 16:00 - Panel Discussion - Data-driven Business Transformation 17:00 - Networking Drinks ****You must register with the event to book your seat**** Register here: https://theinnovationenterprise.com/summits/cdo-singapore-2017/registration For deeper engagement with Apache Apex, download, view past meetup webinars, slides, and docs.  To reduce time to market, look at operable app-templates that you can quickly import and launch.  Examples: HDFS-Sync, Kafka-HDFS, HDFS-Line-Copy, S3-HDFS and HDFS-Kafka. Free DataTorrent Enterprise Edition for qualifying startups. Check it out! Brought to you by DataTorrent, creators of Apache Apex.
events.location: Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel, 392 Havelock Road, Singapore 169663
events.group_name: Next Gen Native Hadoop Big Data Apex Users Group, Singapore

events.name: June Clojure Meetup - Pyroclast + dojo
events.description: It’s time for another monthly Clojure meetup! Agenda: • 7:00 Food & Drinks • 7:30 Introduction to Pyroclast - by Robert Luo • 8:30 dojo with 4clojure and exercism.io  (Please bring your own laptop with Clojure and editor installed) • 9:00 Networking chat Sponsors:  Thanks again to ThoughtWorks and Flybot for organizing and sponsoring this event. Please update your attendance if you can't make it, so folks on the wait list can fill your spot. Slack Channel We have a #clojure-sg slack channel. To join, simply join the Clojurians team:  http://clojurians.net/ and then search for the #clojure-sg channel, where you can post questions or share your clojure using experience.
events.location: ThoughtWorks Singapore, 18 Cross Street, #11-08 China Square Central, Singapore 048423
